head.title: References‣ MathML in HTML5 - Implementation Note

a.title: 3 Presentation Markup ‣ MathML in HTML5 - Implementation Note
Appendix A MathML ‣ MathML in HTML5 - Implementation Note

li.span:
Bert Bos et al.
Cascading Style Sheets Level 2 Revision 1 (CSS 2.1) Specification
W3C Recommendation 07 June 2011, edited in place 17 December 2014 to point to new work (http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/)

John Daggett
CSS Fonts Module
Editor’s Draft, 20 October 2014 (https://drafts.csswg.org/css-fonts-3/)

Tab Atkins and fantasai
CSS Values and Units Module Level 3
W3C Candidate Recommendation, 11 June 2015 (http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-values/)

Sharon Correll
Examples of Complex Rendering (http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&item_id=CmplxRndExamples)

George Kerscher et al.
Specifications for the Digital Talking Book (http://www.daisy.org/z3986/2005/Z3986-2005.html)

Lauren Wood et al.
Document Object Model (DOM) Level 1 Specification Version 1.0
W3C Recommendation 1 October, 1998 (http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-DOM-Level-1/)

Ecma International
ECMAScript Language Specification ECMA-262, 5.1 Edition / June 2011 (http://people.mozilla.org/j̃orendorff/es5.1-final.html)

Ian Hickson et al.
A vocabulary and associated APIs for HTML and XHTML
W3C Recommendation 28 October 2014 (http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/)

S. Bradner
Key words for use in RFCs to Indicate Requirement Levels
http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2119.txt

David Carlisle et al.
Mathematical Markup Language (MathML) Version 3.0 2nd Edition
W3C Recommendation 10 April 2014 (http://www.w3.org/TR/MathML3/)

Michael Brauer et al.
Open Document Format for Office Applications (OpenDocument) v1.0 OASIS Standard, 1 May 2005 (http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/download.php/12572/OpenDocument-v1.0-os.pdf)

ISO and IEC
Information technology – Coding of audio-visual objects – Part 22: Open Font Format Edition 3 , International Published Standard, 9th October 2015 (http://www.iso.org/iso/home/store/catalogue_ics/catalogue_detail_ics.htm?csnumber=66391)

Ulrik Vieth
OpenType Math Illuminated
Biuletyn GUST 25 (2009), pp. 7–16, proceedings of the BachoTEX XVII conference. (http://www.tug.org/TUGboat/tb30-1/tb94vieth.pdf)

Doug Schepers et al.
Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 1.1 (Second Edition)
W3C Recommendation 16 August 2011 (http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/)

Knuth, Donald E.
Published by Addison-Wesley Professional (1984)
ISBN 10: 0201134489 ISBN 13: 9780201134483
Note: The TeXBook source code is available on CTAN. Read ‘beginchapter Appendix G‘ for layout rules.

Henri Sivonen et al.
HTML5-SVG-MathML schema for Nu Html Checker

David Carlisle, Patrick Ion
XML Entity Definitions for Characters (2nd Edition)
W3C Recommendation 10 April 2014 (http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-entity-names/)
